issue.title: [Python] Generalize pyarrow.from_pylist to accept any object implementing the PySequence protocol
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-825](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-825). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is a slight function naming smell that we ought to fix

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-825?focusedCommentId=15969628) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Perhaps as an offshoot of this we consider adding `pyarrow.fromiter` that accepts any iterable.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-825?focusedCommentId=15971690) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 552
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/552>
